name: D
caption: Demand Rate
message: Demand rate must be strictly positive. Use the same time unit as the production rate.

name: A
caption: Ordering/Setup cost
message: Setup/Ordering cost must be strictly positive.

name: ii
caption: Holding cost
message: Holding cost rate must be expressed as a percentage.

name: C
caption: Unit procurement cost
message: Unit procurement cost must be strictly positive.

name: p
caption: Production Rate
message: Leave the default value in case of infinite production rate.

name: Pih
caption: Time dependent shortage cost
message: Leave the default value in case of infinite time dependent shortage cost.

name: base1
caption: Base planning period
message: Base planning period must be strictly positive. Use the same time unit as the demand rate.
